name: Perfect Parry (RuthlessVoid)
description:
Perfect Parry [WIP]

Clear waves  of enemies by parrying their attacks back at them! 

You can only parry attacks by guarding right before the attack lands. 

Controls
  • A or D to Move
  • W or Space to Jump
  • Q or K to Guard
  • J to unleash shockwave when Guard Gauge is full
